subject: RE: [junit] junit test class location - with or without source code.
msgSnippet: ... - same/similar package structure - different directory tree in filesystem Then the tests do not get in your way when you want to compute metrics on your
messageBody:
> i'm looking for arguments for and against keeping junit test classes
> outside if the projects main source tree.

- same/similar package structure
- different directory tree in filesystem

Then the tests do not get in your way when you want
to compute metrics on your sources.

Bernd
